original_title: FUTV Volume One: No Permission, No Apologies!
overview: After three criminal arrests, four civil lawsuits, and more than ten years of taping crazy shit, FUTV VOLUME ONE is finally fucking finished. Guaranteed to be the most humiliating display of human debauchery ever caught on tape or your money back. FU.
title: FUTV Volume One: No Permission, No Apologies!
